title: The Hobbit
creator_credit: Rankin-Bass Productions, Arthur Rankin Jnr and Jules Bass
brief_description: Bilbo Baggins journeys into the Middle Earth, a place inhabited by Elves, dwarves, Wizards, Goblins, Dragons and Hobbits in an effort to reclaim the gold of the Dwarf King. It is an adventurous journey and a battle between the forces of Evil. This animated feature based on J.R.R. Tolkien’s timeless classic features the voices of John Huston (Gandalf the Grey), Otto Preminger (Elvenking) and Orson Bean (Bilbo Baggins).
creator_credit_for_label: Rankin-Bass Productions, Arthur Rankin Jnr and Jules Bass
description:
Bilbo Baggins journeys into Middle Earth, a place inhabited by elves, dwarves, wizards, goblins, dragons and hobbits, in an effort to reclaim the gold of the Dwarf King.

It’s an adventurous journey that features a battle between the forces of good and evil. This animated feature based on JRR Tolkien’s timeless classic features the voices of John Huston (Gandalf the Grey), Otto Preminger (Elvenking) and Orson Bean (Bilbo Baggins).
description_for_label:
Bilbo Baggins journeys into Middle Earth, a place inhabited by elves, dwarves, wizards, goblins, dragons and hobbits, in an effort to reclaim the gold of the Dwarf King.

It’s an adventurous journey that features a battle between the forces of good and evil. This animated feature based on JRR Tolkien’s timeless classic features the voices of John Huston (Gandalf the Grey), Otto Preminger (Elvenking) and Orson Bean (Bilbo Baggins).
